deniyaya sathipola wadidiyunu kirima - deniyaya nagaraya wetha dinakata paminena 25,000ka pamana pirisakata awashya pahasukam salasima sandaha danata abalan thaththwayaka pawathina deniyaya sathipola, kadakamara 80 - 120kin samanwitha welandapola sankirnayak lesa nawa marga paddhathiyak saha yahapath saniparakshaka pahasukamda sahithawa wadidiyunu kara sanwardhanaya kirima pinisa tharuna katayuthu, wyapruthi kalamanakarana saha dakshina sanwardhana amathya sagala rathnayaka mathithuma idiripath kala yojanawa amathya mandalaya wisin anumatha karana ladi.
